trans-unit.source: An <see langword="abstract" /> base class representing a comparison that can be used to constrain an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表可用來限制 <see langword="abstract" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> 的比較的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" /> 基底類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is the abstract base class from which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> is derived.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> 衍生自 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> 抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is evaluated by comparing the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 套用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> 來比較 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> 的值和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> 以評估 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the member whose value will be compared.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定將比較其值的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to be compared.

The value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> will be compared to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 套用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> 來比較 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> 的值和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the operator to use in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定在比較中使用的運算子。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定要比較的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> will be compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 套用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> 來比較 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 的值。
